description: This file defines a React component for a Tic Tac Toe game, including state management, rendering, styling, and utility functions. It features inline SVG icons for game pieces and logic for determining the winner.

methods.name: KnightIcon
methods.description: Functional component rendering an SVG icon representing the Knight (for 'X') piece.

methods.name: QueenIcon
methods.description: Functional component rendering an SVG icon representing the Queen (for 'O') piece.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles a move when a board cell is clicked.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Pure function that determines the winner of the tic tac toe game given the current board state.
